name: Top 25 Nursery Rhymes Videos - Offline & Learning
description: TOP 25 BEST NURSERY RHYMES has selected top rhymes videos, nursery songs, nursery rhymes.  All nursery rhymes videos are COMPLETELY FREE and are available OFFLINE.  All videos are offline and can be played any place any time without the need of data/internet connection.  Parents, Teachers can use this app to teach and learn new rhymes with Sing Along Text.  Nursery Rhymes and songs included in this App  Wheels on the bus go round and round.  Twinkle Twinkle Little Star   Baa Baa Black Sheep  Chubby Cheeks Nursery Song  Hickory Dickory Dock.  Ding Dong Bells Nursery Rhymes  If you are Happy and you know clap your hands  Hush Little song  Jingle Bells Jingle Bells Jingle all the way nursery song  Five Little Monkeys Jumping on Bed, one fell down and hurt his head rhymes  Old McDonald had a farm nursery song  London Bridge is falling down  Happy Birthday Song  Humpty Dumpty Sat on wall rhyme. and and much more favourite rhymes and songs    Features :  High-Quality Videos  Cute Animations  Loveable Characters  Easy access to videos  Nice sounds and background music  We are all ears as always.  Please leave a comment and rate our app. Happy Singing and Happy Rhyming !!!!
